product_name: North Water Sea Tec Safety Kit
long_description: The North Water Sea Tec safety kit comes with basic safety equipment needed for all types of kayakers: bilge pump, safety whistle, paddle leash and paddle float. High-efficiency Aqua-Bound BilgeMaster pump moves water out of the cockpit quickly at 7.5 strokes per gallon. Plastic Mini Fox 40 Safety Whistle allows rescuers or fellow paddlers to locate you quickly. Coiled paddle leash stretches from 1.5 - 5.5 ft. and snaps back to its original shape; hook clips to a deck line, and rip-and-stick webbing wraps around the paddle shaft. Durable, high buoyancy paddle float wraps paddle blade to create a stable outrigger for quick re-entry into cockpit. High-visibility yellow mesh storage bag contains all items in the North Water Sea Tec safety kit.
short_description: The North Water Sea Tec safety kit comes with basic safety equipment needed for all types of kayakers: bilge pump, safety whistle, paddle leash and paddle float.
